title: im level 30 but cant comment on league site

replies.body: It sounds like your boards level was having a little trouble syncing up with your Summoner level. Posting here must have forced an update, because I see you as level 30 now!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TsAmfMI3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-31T20:21:19.990+0000)
>
> It sounds like your boards level was having a little trouble syncing up with your Summoner level. Posting here must have forced an update, because I see you as level 30 now!

im having the same problem please help i want to voice my opinion

Lucky for you making this post pushed the sync through already! I can see you as level 47 right now ^_^.

Go Forth, AND POST!!!
